Vietnamese athletes to get $1M bonus for Olympic gold medal

Any Vietnamese athlete winning a gold medal at the 2024 Olympic Games in France will get a bonus of $1 million.
02/02/2023

International Sports Strategy Foundation, Vietnam Olympic Committee collaborate in training

The International Sports Strategy Foundation (ISF) will open an office in Vietnam, with assistance from Gemopia Investment Group, to boost sport training with Vietnam Olympic Committee.
09/12/2022

Nemo-PVcom Merit Fund eyes int'l investors

Nemo-PVcom Merit Fund (NPMF) has completed its initial round of funding, aiming to up figures in 2022 and 2023 via global investors.
